ygData.subject: Hydra destructor-kit kat

 Hydra took a shot to the back but did not waver. "Don't worry Rodimus soon!" 
As he spoke those words Carnatron came down on Rodimus from behind with plasma 
shots aimed at the back hid head, sent to stun because only Hydras wanted to 
have the pleasure of ending his spark.
 Destructor grabbed Kit Kat and blasted off being sent fling by the shock 
wave. He landed back firs ton the ground taking the impact as he held Kit Kat 
above him. He slid toa  stop and laied theretwitching. He had enough power to 
crawl back to the base but that was about it.
> Windlord::
> 
> "I'll need your help, love"thougth the male"Rodimus is suferring a 
> pain that you can understand and we have to avoid him to reach preds 
> base or he will be lost..."
> 
> "Come Rodimus... Elita is waitting you"siad Windlord.
>
